website_summaries.verdict: Not your average hanging cat scratcher, this option is designed to prevent furniture fiends from destroying your couch upholstery.
pros: Linen flap secures under a couch cushion while a wide sisal scratch mat drapes over the couch arm, effectively preventing damage caused by undeterrable furniture scratchers
Earns praise for its durable construction
Subtle design blends well with living room furniture
cons: A weighted bottom hem would greatly improve the design

customer_reviews.title: protects your couches!
customer_reviews.text: I have two very expensive couches that have been ruined due to my cats feeling the need to scratch every surface they can get their little claws on. I purchased this in hopes that it will deter them from ruining any more of my furniture! My cats avoided it at first but once I sprayed some catnip on it, they went crazy. Now they only scratch this mat and they leave my other surfaces alone! SO happy to see that I have relatively undamaged furniture now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Hey, if my cat can type, she would be the one writing this review. With her permission, I'm giving five stars for this product. Before purchasing this scratching pad, my cat had her scratch all over my room. This product saved me some cash for buying another table, mattress, sofa, writing desk; you name it.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We've all purchased cat scratching posts and other devices that cats completely ignore, but my mother's cat started sharpening her claws on this one before we could even put it up on the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Strong great product
customer_reviews.text: Having a giant cat that doesnt always allow me to trim his nails this has come in handy! He was drawn to it the moment I brought the box in the house! Put it on the couch he immediately started using this to scratch at, also loves to lay on the part that covers the arm of the couch! I was worried it may not work on my couch bc I dont have wide arms but it fits perfectly and hasnt moved even with his big ol butt trying to move it!
customer_reviews.author: Sally S.

customer_reviews.title: Save your furniture and give your cats more surface to scratch!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this thing. My only complaint is that the fabric that hangs over the chair arm is very high quality and very smooth so my phone is constantly sliding off of it lol. But one of my cats used to scratch this chair up and since investing in this thing, she only ever scratches it at the mat, saving my chair!
customer_reviews.author: Austin E.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: My cat and I love it! There are three cats in my family, so how to keep the cat from scratching the sofa has always been a big problem in our family. I tried different cat scratchers, but they were of poor quality and broke down after only a few days. This time, I chose this expensive cat scratcher on amazon. It is different from other cat scratchers and can cover the side of my sofa very well. After a few days of purchase, none of my three cats started scratching the couch, preferring the new scratchpad. And its quality is very good. I am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Protects your furniture but not exactly as it’s advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The cats don’t use it at all to scratch, which is may be a good thing. It does protect the arms of my couch whenever they are active and running/jumping on furniture with claws out. The product could be improved with eliminating the berber, since the cats don’t use it and replacing it with maybe some weights on the ends to help keep it in place, or maybe line the underside with some of that ever sticky/no residue material.
customer_reviews.author: kubrickollector

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for on the side of a couch or bed. Stopped my cat from scratching my sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H.

customer_reviews.title: my cat likes cheap toys
customer_reviews.text: i tried everything i could think of to get her to scratch this instead of the front of my chair. if i get her something expensive she flat out ignores it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Alansky

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! It’s nice and long and wide - can cover our whole settee. The sisal is tough and the denim soft. I put it on my lap whenever my cat wants rubs and starts scratching!
customer_reviews.author: CRG84

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but cat doesn't use it.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but my cat doesn't use it because...well...cat. It does prevent my couch from getting scratched in that spot, but I think the real trick was getting an upright cardboard scratcher next to the couch. Hopefully this works for the less finicky feline!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: He desn't like it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat would go and scratch any place on the couch, except where the cover is. Maybe there is something wrong with my cat!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok for the back of couch
customer_reviews.text: We have a sectional. The length of the anchor is too long for the scratcher to go over the edge of the couch. This scracher goes into the back of our sleeper sofa. It is ideal for this funciton because it goes under multiple anchor cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Haleigh Eppler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, just waiting for my new kitten to start digging into it. Might need to add some catnip.
customer_reviews.author: Bailee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty useless. Way too stiff. It doesn’t sit well on the arm of the couch even after washing as suggested. The cats had no interest in it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Josie James

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: My cats don't use it as much as I'd like, but it does keep them from scratching the couch.
customer_reviews.author: A. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Good scratch mat
customer_reviews.text: It protected my coach from my cat claws. Easy to attach and easy to clean. My cats like it. Will set it on the wall later.
customer_reviews.author: Waxinton

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. My cats stopped scratching my couch when I added this. It’s not bad looking and it’s washable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: At first my cat didn’t care for it.. but now I see here using it very often. Happy cat mom
customer_reviews.author: Meron Haile

customer_reviews.title: So narrow. No one's couch is that size.
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised how narrow it is. No couch or arm chair would be protected, on one side, by this. All the cat has to do is walk past it and scratch. The rest of that side of the couch is fully exposed. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Cat loved it. Scratches this over anything else.
customer_reviews.text: This was an instant hit. Unfortunately, it’s in one room. I’ll need to get one for every carpeted room in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia (Ginny) Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: It smells strongly and my cats refused to go near it. They just scratched the sofa around it.
customer_reviews.author: mother of pearl

customer_reviews.title: Cat has scratched on it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working out well. Cat has scratched on it instead of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love it and it is saving a chair that for some reason is irresistible
customer_reviews.author: Carlette B. Whitesides

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I love the mat.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this scratch mat! Thank goodness, its claws don't scratch my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy G

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like photo and my cat likes it. I live that it doesn’t take up space, too
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The cats stay away
customer_reviews.text: My cats seem to dislike the pads so job well done!
customer_reviews.author: Syaronn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It fits over the edge of the couch and the cats are using it instead of the couch itself.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L. Garcia

product_meta.title: Docamor Cat Scratching Mat Sisal Sofa Shield Pet Furniture Cover Washable and Durable Cat Scratcher Pad Cover to Prevent Furniture Scratch
